attributes.action: make the throwing of eggs in public an imprisonable offence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we wish to petition the prime minister to make the throwing of eggs in public  an imprisonable offence And raise the age for buying eggs to 21 yrs of age and impose hefty fines on outlets who are knowingly found to be selling eggs to persons who they can reasonably be expected to be aware of who are not buying eggs soley  for consumption. we also petition for egg wardens  who will undertake to patrol the streets to catch egg throwers.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
